pages.text:
Careers
Parties & Events
Bring your guests to the lanes, and turn every occasion into an epic celebration. Contact our team of party planning experts and get started today.
Plan a Party
Contact an Event Planner
Corporate Parties
Elevate your next corporate outing! Our office parties and corporate events are easy to plan and completely stress-free.
Plan a Corporate Event
Kids Parties
Our bowling parties for kids are fun and easy to plan! Design the perfect birthday party for your kids, their friends, and yourself.
Book a Kids Party
Teen Parties
Bowl on blacklight lanes, relax on your own reserved lane, and dig into insta-worthy treats Perfect for teen birthdays!
Book a Teen Party
Social Events
The perfect backdrop for every occasion! Birthdays, bachelorette parties, reunions, and any occasion you can think of!
Book a Social Event
National Events
Let our team of seasoned national event planning experts plan your next National Event.
Host a National Event
Talk to a Planner
Get in touch with our expert party planners and let us bring your event to life!
Contact Us
Let Us Plan Your Next Event!
Whether it’s a birthday party, a corporate gathering, or a fun day out with friends, our event sales team is ready to help make it special. Let’s start planning your unforgettable event today!
Contact Us
Parties & Events Menu
We cater to your event with an Instagrammable lineup of oversized shareables, custom party platters, and a wide variety of beer, wine, and craft cocktails.
Frequently Asked Questions
What kind of parties can be booked online?
What if I'm not sure about my party's final headcount?
Can I add more people to my party’s headcount after I book?
What is your cancellation policy?
What if I need to change/edit my reservation after I've already checked out?
How do I reserve a private room?
Can I reserve private lanes for group events?
View All FAQs
We had such a memorable time at our bowling party!
The venue had a great atmosphere, the service was excellent, and the food was amazing. The online booking process was quick and easy. Will definitely be back for more fun!
The venue had a great atmosphere, the service was excellent, and the food was amazing. The online booking process was quick and easy. Will definitely be back for more fun!
Emily D.
The booking process was so easy
and the staff made us feel like VIPs once we arrived. Plus, the food options were a pleasant surprise - something for everyone to enjoy.
and the staff made us feel like VIPs once we arrived. Plus, the food options were a pleasant surprise - something for everyone to enjoy.
Alex G.
Our party was a hit!
The staff was friendly and helpful our entire visit, and the venue was top-notch.  We'll definitely be back for more celebrations!
The staff was friendly and helpful our entire visit, and the venue was top-notch.  We'll definitely be back for more celebrations!
Michael T.
We had an unforgettable evening at our company holiday party!
The bowling was so fun, and with the added bonus of an arcade, our group had a blast between frames. It was a perfect complement to an already fantastic evening.
The bowling was so fun, and with the added bonus of an arcade, our group had a blast between frames. It was a perfect complement to an already fantastic evening.
Jessica B.
